text: if you'd seen that building go up like I
saw it for my black window you'd know
that building was not fit for purpose
somewhere along the line someone made a
catastrophic error at the moment we're
grieving you know but there's a public
anger underneath and we do want to see
someone else accountable for this I feel
angry that I saw people dying in front
of my eyes I saw kids and woman and kids
this age hanging from windows with
teddys and that angered me and nobody
could help them that really angered me
there are a few who I know who are
already dead I know for certain that
they're dead there are a few others who
I strongly suspect are dead the only
thing that's keeping me going at the
moment is anger and adrenaline and I
will keep going on anger and adrenaline
for as long as I can because frankly I'd
rather not sit down and actually
contemplate that the actual scale of
what's happened around here because I
think that if I do sit down I won't
stand up again
